eventName: Such is the Joy of Our Reunion
storyInfo: Chaos reigns in the banquet hall, and Xingzhu covers for Blaze as she leaves the scene. Blaze is stopped as she tries to escape, and the one who stops her tells her her true identity: the descendant of the traitorous Grand Preceptor, who committed treason forty years ago.

attributes.content: Fire! FIRE!
attributes.name: Incoherent Voice

attributes.content: Assassins! Protect His Majesty!
attributes.name: Incoherent Voice

attributes.content: Guards, guards—
attributes.name: Incoherent Voice

attributes.content: Put out that fire! Lock the dining area down!
attributes.name: Patrolling Guardsman

attributes.content: Take care—
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: The source of this fire...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Everyone! Stay away from the wine in the cups!
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: (A fire that does not burn hot...)
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: (Who did this... and what are they up to?)
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Lin Qingyan tries to calm down the panicking crowd, but her voice is quickly drowned out by the shouting and screaming.
In the midst of the chaos, she spots a familiar face.
Their eyes met for only a moment, but she is more sure than anything.
That person saw her, saw her attempt to cross the line of propriety in front of all.
But the target is not her.
Blaze...!
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: What's going on? What's with all this ruckus?
attributes.name: Mo Bufu

attributes.content: This is bad! I heard some kind of demonic fire broke out at the banquet! No idea how it happened!
attributes.name: Veteran Chef

attributes.content: The guards have the dining area surrounded. No idea what's going on inside, or if His Majesty is hurt...
attributes.name: Veteran Chef

attributes.content: They're talking about... cutting the Feast short...
attributes.name: Veteran Chef

attributes.content: Lin Qingyan...!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: We've been notified of unknown persons infiltrating the Feast. We will now be conducting an inspection.
attributes.name: Guard A

attributes.content: I ask that everyone stay where they are and not move. Please cooperate.
attributes.name: Guard A

attributes.content: (Dammit... What the hell happened over where Leizi is?)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: (This is bad. I can't leave her to fend for herself. I need to go take a look...)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You there! Stop moving!
attributes.name: Guard B

attributes.content: (What do I do what do I do? I can't get in a fight here!)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: (No time to think, dammit!)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: After her!
attributes.name: Guard B

attributes.content: First Battalion, Fifth Battalion, seal off the southern entrance! Seventh and Ninth, close the northern gate!
attributes.name: Guard Chief

attributes.content: Everyone else, sweep the palace from south to north. If you find anyone suspicious, arrest them immediately.
attributes.name: Guard Chief

attributes.content: Our intel says there are at least two culprits working together to ruin the Feast, so take care!
attributes.name: Guard Chief

attributes.content: So many guards... What a pain.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What kinda trouble did you manage to get yourself into here, Leizi?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Sounds like you haven't gotten caught yet, at least... So where the hell are you?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Tsch... This palace is way too big...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Why're you here?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Shh—
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: I thought you two just wanted to ask His Majesty to reopen the case? How did it come to this?
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: I don't know either! That fire's not our doing!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But the timing...
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: You need to leave, right away! There's no talking your way out of it if they find you.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: What I need to do is save Lin Qingyan!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: ...Let me go look for her.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: How can I ask you to do something that dangerous?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'm more familiar with the Forbidden City than you are. Even If I did get caught, I'll have some leeway to explain myself.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Don't worry. I'll find her.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You still don't trust me. What, still angry at me?
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Of course not—
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Head to the southern exit, before the guards seal it off!
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: We'll meet up at that restaurant once we're all out of here.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: ...Okay.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You take care too.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Wait, did the soldiers manage to get a good look at you?
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Err... Yeah, I think so.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: That's... not good.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Oh, I know! Let's swap clothes. Come on, get them off.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: I saw someone running away up ahead! Over there!
attributes.name: Patrolling Soldier

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: The dining area's been cleared out... Deputy Minister Lin wouldn't be here.
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: But who started all this at the Feast...
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: I hope Blaze managed to make it out by now—
attributes.name: Ning Yin

attributes.content: Why is she here?
These two...
Is this fate at work?
Looks like it's not too far away now...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Wonder how things are going over on their side...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Found you...
Who's there?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: So it was you.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: Damn... That's one hell of a sword!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You're not dressed like your average soldier. What are you, a general?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Save the chatter.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: So you're the one Lin Qingyan has been hiding behind her back... But why would she bring you to the Forbidden City?
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: Err... So I know it's impolite to barge in on someone else's banquet, but would you believe me if I said we didn't mean anything bad by it...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What I'm trying to say is that this is all a misunderstanding...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: There is no misunderstanding here. The Imperial Guard have been searching for you for forty years.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: You are her descendant.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: What are you talking about? Whose descendant? Who's 'her'?
attributes.name: Blaze
Junior Drillmaster
attributes.content: You really don't know—

attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster
attributes.content: No. It seems you're not lying.
attributes.joined: You really don't know—No. It seems you're not lying.

attributes.content: All this time you've been hidden away, and nobody thought to tell you about your history?
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: Haha, got me there... I'm pretty curious about it, not gonna lie. Anyone I can ask about it?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But seriously, the Imperial Guard? Looking for me?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Forty years ago, only a single child was unaccounted for in the family of a treasonous mandarin.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: You... What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze... I need to confirm something...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: You were born in 1062, in Victoria, right?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Yes. From as far back as I can remember, I lived in Victoria.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Your father seemed to have been spending a lot of time pursuing a certain 'truth' in the last few years of his life.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: What if... you found out everything around you was one big lie...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Wha...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Y—You're talking nonsense! Bi zui!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You are a person of interest. We'll figure out what to do with you after questioning.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: Come with me.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: Forget that!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: (Gah—!)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You're no weakling, it seems. I might not be able to take you in without hurting you.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: If you don't wish to be harmed, then surrender immediately.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: I'm not in the mood for jokes right now!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: (Panting heavily)
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Didn't I tell you... to save yourself if... something happened...?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: ...Lin Qingyan.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: Lin Qingyan's eyes meet Blaze's.
She understands what has happened, but all she has to offer is silence.
She turns and stands in front of Blaze, shielding her.
Your deeds at the Judicial Review Office are worthy of my respect, Deputy Minister Lin. And I was kind enough to remind you before.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: It seems you have decided to completely ignore my warning.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: I am perfectly aware what I'm doing. I don't need your reminders.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: You know who she really is. Yet to go so far as to protect the descendant of a traitorous mandarin...
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: For the truth. The truth you are all too afraid to talk about.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Lin Qingyan!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What are you two talking about...? What do you mean... I'm the descendant of a traitor?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: My dad... Who is he? Why did he die...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Forgive me. I was planning to tell you everything after tonight. But it seems now is not a good time.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: I will make it up to you later however you like. Provided we make it out of here alive, that is.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: She will be coming with me tonight.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: As long as I am here, she will not.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Forget that. You will need three of you to simply obstruct me.
attributes.name: Junior Drillmaster

attributes.content: Lin Qingyan!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Go already!
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: A burst of lightning blasts open a hole in the palace wall. Before the dust has even settled, a somewhat gentler blast of energy strikes Blaze.
She is sent flying out of the Forbidden City, falling towards a distant patch of ground.
Blaze has done these sort of high-altitude leaps countless times before as a form of dynamic entry into the battlefield, or wherever happened to need her.
She has never once felt fear. She believed in her own strength, and in her many friends.
There was never any confusion in her mind either. She knew who she was. She knew where she must go. She knew what she believed in.
There is no plot that can hold back her heat, just like how the mist of dawn cannot hide away the sun.
But now?
What awaits her is no longer solid ground, but an endless abyss.
She closes her eyes.
Where...?
attributes.name: Ning Shu

attributes.content: Ning Yin lies on the bed, her breathing faint.
The crutch in the old man's hand shudders, and he nearly falls over.
After having seen so many things across so many years, he thought nothing more in this world could shock him.
His lips open and close, yet try as he might, he can make no sound.
Until someone in the shadows begins to speak first.
She yet lives.
It's you—
attributes.name: Ning Shu

attributes.content: Stay your steps, Mr. Ning. Come no closer.
You never saw me tonight, and she never left the house.
She... But why...?
attributes.name: Ning Shu

attributes.content: She intruded upon the Feast of a Hundred Delicacies. She was with that girl when I discovered her.
If she had run into anyone else, she would not still be alive.
Impossible...
attributes.name: Ning Shu

attributes.content: Forty years... I can't believe it's you again...
attributes.name: Ning Shu

attributes.content: Forty years ago, you left her here. Now, you save her life once more, save her from a terrible fate.
attributes.name: Ning Shu

attributes.content: Fate... This must be fate...
attributes.name: Ning Shu

attributes.content: There's no escaping it. There never was.
attributes.name: Ning Shu

attributes.content: I did not leave her here for her sake. It was you who saved her, Mr. Ning.
You once swore an oath to never let anyone know the truth of this case in exchange for her name. But it seems you are now wavering when it comes to past vows.
The True Lung will know of tonight's events.
The choice is yours, Mr. Ning.
A gust of wind, and it was like nobody was even there.
The old man stands in stunned silence.
His daze is interrupted as he hears a sound coming from outside the courtyard walls.
A sound like roaring, like weeping, like admonishment.
I must be going mad...
attributes.name: Ning Shu

attributes.content: It's autumn. Why do I hear cicadas...?
attributes.name: Ning Shu

attributes.content: Ah—!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Where... How did I get here?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Oh, finally awake I see.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: I knew you were one tough Feline. Look at you, as lively as a fin on a line.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Jiang was making a fuss about calling a doctor. He was shouting so hard he forgot what time it was.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: How long was I out... Wait, where are they?!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Lin Qingyan... Did Ning Yin come by here? I... Seriously, how did I get here?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Alright, slow down. I don't even know where to start with all these questions.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Last night I was on my way to the night market to get some cheap veggies when I found you lying down in the middle of the street. Thought you were drunk at first.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: I was worried you'd freeze to death or something, so I brought you back here.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: You were cursing up a storm in your sleep, hypocrite this, swindler that, and a lot more besides... Tsk, I don't know where you managed to learn such creative Yanese.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: The Ning Yin you mentioned, and whoever this Lin Qingyan is... Never seen them before, so I dunno if they were here.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: I need to go find them—
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Whoa, whoa, where're you going?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: The Forbidden City.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I just saw a whole bunch of guards patrolling around there. You think you can still get in?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: I don't care. I have to go—
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Who d'you think you're going to find, after having lost yourself like that?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: You... What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Just speaking the truth here. You lost yourself, yeah?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: You don't know where your self has gone, where it's wandered off to. You hear a few words from someone else and wouldn't you know it, you barely even know your own name, much less who you are.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Such absurdity...
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: A tangerine seed is blown from Jiangnan to Jiangbei, where it takes root and yields fine fruit. What let this seed grow so well wasn't Jiangnan or Jiangbei, but decades worth of rain and sun.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: It's ultimately the same fruit. Jiangnan and Jiangbei might not be the same place, but an orange is an orange. Doesn't matter where you eat it.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: All things begin, all things end. There is the outer truth, and the inner truth. Once you figure that out, then you can get back to asking your questions.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: You... Do you know something about all this? What do you know?! Tell me!
attributes.name: Blaze
Young Chef
attributes.content: What do I know? I'm a chef, all I know is how to season my ingredients, how to boil stuff, stir-fry stuff, regular fry stuff—

attributes.name: Young Chef
attributes.content: Oh, right. Seeing you reminded me of something.
attributes.joined: What do I know? I'm a chef, all I know is how to season my ingredients, how to boil stuff, stir-fry stuff, regular fry stuff—Oh, right. Seeing you reminded me of something.

attributes.content: Weren't you trying to find authentic tangerine cakes?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: I think I know how to make those.
attributes.name: Young Chef
